title: Reckless
description:
Kate Willett, Roy Lazorwitz and Stephanie Smith share stories about bad boundaries, drunken romantic confusion, and how sexually transmitted infections aren't the end of the world.

Support RISK! on Patreon at Patreon.com/RISK

Hire Kevin Allison as a coach at KevinAllison.com
author: Kevin@RISK-show.com (Kate Willett, Nadéah, Roy Lazorwitz, The Housemartins, Stephanie Smith, Elvis Presley, Chancha Via Circuito, Kevin Allison)
